article.title: Southwest Research Institute Receives Naval Contract for Anti-terrorism and Force Protection Programs
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The Southwest Research Institute has received a $25.7 million indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract to provide specialized technical and engineering support services for the U.S. Navy's identity management development and operations capability and other anti-terrorism/force protection programs. The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Dahlgren Division, Dahlgren, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
